author: dlr
msg: * STATUS: Add r21845 to the r21531 group, and improve the justification.

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r21531, updating our minimum build-time Neon version.
Regardless of which version of Neon is used at runtime, Subversion
should be built against Neon 0.26.1+ (on Windows, at least) to
auth type allows GSSAPI/SSPI to be enabled or disabled on Windows.

is never modified by its consumer (the append_component_to_paths()
